events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The reported issue concerns a refund request due to the customer receiving the wrong item.
Support agent team member Alice has been assigned to handle the refund request for this order.
Hello! I’m Alice from customer support. I understand you’ve received the wrong item and I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and send us a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the item I received, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and arrange for a prepaid return shipping label to send the wrong item back.
Thank you for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the assistance and look forward to the refund.
Your refund has been processed, and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction. Feel free to reach out with any other questions.
We are closing this case as resolved. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
